title: Mimeo Photos adds new product options with framed prints and canvases
content:
Mimeo Photos has become one of the most popular options for printing photos on Macs and iOS devices since Apple discontinued its own printing service in the Photos app. This month, Mimeo announced new photo product options, which include framed prints and canvases.

more…

The post Mimeo Photos adds new product options with framed prints and canvases appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Photo printing app Mimeo Photos announced new photo product options, which include framed prints and canvases.
